ui.welcome:
Benvenuto in ZORK!
Un grande impero sotterraneo ti aspetta.
Digita AIUTO per i comandi.
ui.goodbye:
Grazie per aver giocato!
La tua avventura è terminata.
ui.cant_go: Non puoi andare da quella parte.
ui.darkness: È buio pesto. È probabile che verrai mangiato da un grue.
ui.lamp_dim: La tua lanterna si sta affievolendo.

help.title: COMANDI
help.movement: Movimento: n/nord, s/sud, e/est, o/ovest, u/su, d/giù
help.put: metti X in Y - Metti oggetto in contenitore

west_of_house.name: A Ovest della Casa
west_of_house.description:
Ti trovi in un campo aperto a ovest di una casa bianca, con la porta d'ingresso chiodata.
C'è una piccola cassetta postale qui.

north_of_house.name: A Nord della Casa
north_of_house.description: Sei di fronte al lato nord di una casa bianca. Non c'è porta qui, e tutte le finestre sono sbarrate.

south_of_house.name: A Sud della Casa
south_of_house.description: Sei di fronte al lato sud di una casa bianca. Non c'è porta qui, e tutte le finestre sono sbarrate.

east_of_house.name: Dietro la Casa
east_of_house.description: Sei dietro la casa bianca. Un sentiero porta nella foresta a est. In un angolo della casa c'è una piccola finestra leggermente aperta.

kitchen.name: Cucina
kitchen.description: Sei nella cucina della casa bianca. Un tavolo sembra essere stato usato di recente per preparare cibo. Un passaggio porta a ovest e una scala scura sale verso l'alto.

living_room.name: Soggiorno
living_room.description: Sei nel soggiorno. C'è una porta a est, una porta di legno con strane lettere gotiche a nord, e un grande tappeto orientale al centro della stanza.

attic.name: Soffitta
attic.description: Questa è la soffitta. L'unica uscita è una scala che scende. Una grande corda è nell'angolo. Su un tavolo c'è un coltello dall'aspetto minaccioso.

cellar.name: Cantina
cellar.description: Sei in una cantina buia e umida con un passaggio stretto a nord e un cunicolo a sud.

stone_barrow.name: Tumulo di Pietra
stone_barrow.description:
Ti trovi davanti a un enorme tumulo di pietra. Sul lato est
c'e una gigantesca porta di pietra aperta. Non riesci a vedere
nell'oscurita della tomba.

forest_1.name: Foresta
forest_1.description:
Questa e una foresta, con alberi in tutte le direzioni. A est
sembra esserci la luce del sole.

forest_2.name: Foresta
forest_2.description: Questa è una foresta poco illuminata, con grandi alberi tutt'intorno.

mountains.name: Foresta
mountains.description: La foresta si dirada, rivelando montagne invalicabili.

forest_3.name: Foresta
forest_3.description: Questa è una foresta poco illuminata, con grandi alberi tutt'intorno.

path.name: Sentiero nella Foresta
path.description:
Questo e un sentiero che serpeggia in una foresta poco illuminata.
Qui il sentiero va da nord a sud. Un albero particolarmente grande,
con alcuni rami bassi, si trova al bordo del sentiero.

clearing.name: Spiazzo
clearing.description:
Sei in un piccolo spiazzo su un sentiero ben segnato che
prosegue a est e a ovest.

troll_room.name: La Stanza del Troll
troll_room.description:
Questa e una piccola stanza con passaggi a est e a sud e un
minaccioso buco verso ovest. Macchie di sangue e graffi profondi
(forse fatti da un'ascia) segnano le pareti.

east_of_chasm.name: A Est del Baratro
east_of_chasm.description:
Sei sul bordo orientale di un baratro, il cui fondo non e visibile.
Un passaggio stretto va a nord, e il sentiero su cui ti trovi
continua verso est.

gallery.name: Galleria
gallery.description:
Questa e una galleria d'arte. La maggior parte dei quadri e stata
rubata da vandali di gusto eccezionale. I vandali se ne sono andati
attraverso l'uscita a nord o quella a ovest.

studio.name: Studio
studio.description:
Questo sembra essere stato lo studio di un artista. Pareti e pavimento
sono schizzati di vernice in 69 colori diversi. Stranamente, qui non e
appeso nulla di valore. All'estremita sud della stanza c'e una porta
aperta (anch'essa coperta di vernice). Un camino stretto e buio sale da
un focolare; anche se forse potresti salirci, sembra improbabile che
tu riesca poi a ridiscendere.

maze_1.name: Labirinto
maze_1.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_2.name: Labirinto
maze_2.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_3.name: Labirinto
maze_3.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_4.name: Labirinto
maze_4.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

dead_end_1.name: Vicolo Cieco
dead_end_1.description: Sei arrivato a un vicolo cieco nel labirinto.

maze_5.name: Labirinto
maze_5.description:
Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.
Uno scheletro, probabilmente i resti di un avventuriero sfortunato, giace qui.

dead_end_2.name: Vicolo Cieco
dead_end_2.description: Sei arrivato a un vicolo cieco nel labirinto.

maze_6.name: Labirinto
maze_6.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_7.name: Labirinto
maze_7.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_8.name: Labirinto
maze_8.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

dead_end_3.name: Vicolo Cieco
dead_end_3.description: Sei arrivato a un vicolo cieco nel labirinto.

maze_9.name: Labirinto
maze_9.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_10.name: Labirinto
maze_10.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_11.name: Labirinto
maze_11.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

grating_room.name: Stanza della Grata
grating_room.description: Sei in una piccola stanza con una grata di ferro nel soffitto.

maze_12.name: Labirinto
maze_12.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

dead_end_4.name: Vicolo Cieco
dead_end_4.description: Sei arrivato a un vicolo cieco nel labirinto.

maze_13.name: Labirinto
maze_13.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_14.name: Labirinto
maze_14.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

maze_15.name: Labirinto
maze_15.description: Questa è parte di un labirinto di piccoli passaggi tortuosi, tutti uguali.

strange_passage.name: Strange Passage
strange_passage.description:
This is a long passage. To the west is one entrance. On the
east there is an old wooden door, with a large opening in it (about
cyclops sized).

treasure_room.name: Stanza del Tesoro
treasure_room.description:
This is a large room, whose east wall is solid granite. A number
of discarded bags, which crumble at your touch, are scattered about
on the floor. There is an exit down a staircase.

stream_view.name: Stream View
stream_view.description:
You are standing on a path beside a gently flowing stream. The path
follows the stream, which flows from west to east.

in_stream.name: Stream
in_stream.description:
You are on the gently flowing stream. The upstream route is too narrow
to navigate, and the downstream route is invisible due to twisting
walls. There is a narrow beach to land on.

small_cave.name: Cave
small_cave.description:
This is a tiny cave with entrances west and north, and a staircase
leading down.

tiny_cave.name: Cave
tiny_cave.description:
This is a tiny cave with entrances west and north, and a dark,
forbidding staircase leading down.

cold_passage.name: Cold Passage
cold_passage.description:
This is a cold and damp corridor where a long east-west passageway
turns into a southward path.

narrow_passage.name: Passaggio Stretto
narrow_passage.description:
This is a long and narrow corridor where a long north-south passageway
briefly narrows even further.

winding_passage.name: Winding Passage
winding_passage.description:
This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits
on the east and north.

twisting_passage.name: Twisting Passage
twisting_passage.description:
This is a winding passage. It seems that there are only exits
on the east and north.

atlantis_room.name: Atlantis Room
atlantis_room.description:
This is an ancient room, long under acqua. There is an exit to
the south and a staircase leading up.

ew_passage.name: Passaggio Est-Ovest
ew_passage.description:
This is a narrow east-west passageway. There is a narrow stairway
leading down at the north end of the room.

round_room.name: Stanza Rotonda
round_room.description:
This is a circular stone room with passages in all directions. Several
of them have unfortunately been blocked by cave-ins.

damp_cave.name: Digap Cave
damp_cave.description:
This cave has exits to the west and east, and narrows to a crack toward
the south. The earth is particularly damp here.

ns_passage.name: Passaggio Nord-Sud
ns_passage.description: This is a high north-south passage, which forks to the northeast.

chasm_room.name: Chasm
chasm_room.description:
A chasm runs southwest to northeast and the path follows it. You are
on the south side of the chasm, where a crack opens into a passage.

land_of_living_dead.name: Land of the Dead
land_of_living_dead.description:
You have entered the Terra dei Morti Viventi. Thousands of lost souls
can be heard weeping and moaning. In the corner are stacked the remains
of dozens of previous adventurers less fortunate than yourself.
A passage exits to the north.

engravings_cave.name: Engravings Cave
engravings_cave.description: You have entered a low cave with passages leading northwest and east.

egypt_room.name: Egyptian Room
egypt_room.description:
This is a room which looks like an Egyptian tomb. There is an
ascending staircase to the west.

north_temple.name: Tempio
north_temple.description:
This is the north end of a large temple. On the east wall is an
ancient inscription, probably a prayer in a long-forgotten language.
Below the prayer is a staircase leading down. The west wall is solid
granite. The exit to the north end of the room is through huge
marble pillars.

south_temple.name: Altare
south_temple.description:
This is the south end of a large temple. In front of you is what
appears to be an altar. In one corner is a small hole in the floor
which leads into darkness. You probably could not get back up it.

maintenance_room.name: Sala Manutenzione
maintenance_room.description:
This is what appears to have been the maintenance room for Flood
Control Diga #3. Apparently, this room has been ransaccoed recently, for
most of the valuable equipment is gone. On the wall in front of you is a
group of buttons colored blue, yellow, brown, and red. There are doorways to
the west and south.

dam_base.name: Diga Base
dam_base.description:
You are at the base of Flood Control Diga #3, which looms above you
and to the north. The river Frigid is flowing by here. Along the
river are the White Cliffs which seem to form giant walls stretching
from north to south along the shores of the river as it winds its
way downstream.

river_1.name: Frigid River
river_1.description:
You are on the Frigid River in the vicinity of the Diga. The river
flows quietly here. There is a landing on the west shore.

river_2.name: Frigid River
river_2.description:
The river turns a corner here making it impossible to see the
Diga. The White Cliffs loom on the east bank and large rocks prevent
landing on the west.

river_3.name: Frigid River
river_3.description:
The river descends here into a valley. There is a narrow beach on the
west shore below the cliffs. In the distance a faint rumbling can be
heard.

white_cliffs_north.name: White Cliffs Beach
white_cliffs_north.description:
You are on a narrow strip of beach which runs along the base of the
White Cliffs. There is a narrow path heading south along the Cliffs
and a tight passage leading west into the cliffs themselves.

white_cliffs_south.name: White Cliffs Beach
white_cliffs_south.description:
You are on a rocky, narrow strip of beach beside the Cliffs. A
narrow path leads north along the shore.

river_4.name: Frigid River
river_4.description:
The river is running faster here and the sound ahead appears to be
that of rushing acqua. On the east shore is a sandy beach. A small
area of beach can also be seen below the cliffs on the west shore.

river_5.name: Frigid River
river_5.description:
The sound of rushing acqua is nearly unbearable here. On the east
shore is a large landing area.

shore.name: Shore
shore.description:
You are on the east shore of the river. The acqua here seems somewhat
treacherous. A path travels from north to south here, the south end
quickly turning around a sharp corner.

sandy_beach.name: Sandy Beach
sandy_beach.description:
You are on a large sandy beach on the east shore of the river, which is
flowing quickly by. A path runs beside the river to the south here, and
a passage is partially buried in sand to the northeast.

sandy_cave.name: Sandy Cave
sandy_cave.description: This is a sand-filled cave whose exit is to the southwest.

on_rainbow.name: On the Rainbow
on_rainbow.description:
You are on top of a rainbow (I bet you never thought you would walk
on a rainbow), with a magnificent view of the Falls. The rainbow
travels east-west here.

end_of_rainbow.name: End of Rainbow
end_of_rainbow.description:
You are on a small, rocky beach on the continuation of the Frigid
River past the Falls. The beach is narrow due to the presence of the
White Cliffs. The river canyon opens here and sunlight shines in
from above. A rainbow crosses over the falls to the east and a narrow
path continues to the southwest.

canyon_bottom.name: Canyon Bottom
canyon_bottom.description:
You are beneath the walls of the river canyon which may be climbable
here. The lesser part of the runoff of Aragain Falls flows by below.
To the north is a narrow path.

cliff_middle.name: Rocky Ledge
cliff_middle.description:
You are on a ledge about halfway up the wall of the river canyon.
You can see from here that the main flow from Aragain Falls twists
along a passage which it is impossible for you to enter. Below you is the
canyon bottom. Above you is more cliff, which appears
climbable.

canyon_view.name: Canyon View
canyon_view.description:
You are at the top of the Great Canyon on its west wall. From here
there is a marvelous view of the canyon and parts of the Frigid River
upstream. Across the canyon, the walls of the White Cliffs join the
mighty ramparts of the Flathead Montagne to the east. Following the
Canyon upstream to the north, Aragain Falls may be seen, complete with
rainbow. The mighty Frigid River flows out from a great dark cavern. To
the west and south can be seen an immense forest, stretching for miles
around. A path leads northwest. It is possible to climb down into
the canyon from here.

mine_entrance.name: Miniera Entrance
mine_entrance.description:
You are standing at the entrance of what might have been a coal mine.
The shaft enters the west wall, and there is another exit on the south
end of the room.

squeeky_room.name: Squeaky Room
squeeky_room.description:
You are in a small room. Strange squeaky sounds may be heard coming
from the passage at the north end. You may also escape to the east.

shaft_room.name: Stanza del Pozzo
shaft_room.description:
This is a large room, in the middle of which is a small shaft
descending through the floor into darkness below. To the west and
the north are exits from this room. Constructed over the top of the
shaft is a metal framework to which a heavy iron chain is attached.

smelly_room.name: Smelly Room
smelly_room.description:
This is a small nondescript room. However, from the direction
of a small descending staircase a foul odor can be detected. To the
south is a narrow tunnel.

gas_room.name: Stanza del Gas
gas_room.description:
This is a small room which smells strongly of coal gas. There is a
short climb up some stairs and a narrow tunnel leading east.

ladder_top.name: Ladder Top
ladder_top.description:
This is a very small room. In the corner is a rickety wooden
ladder, leading downward. It might be safe to descend. There is
also a staircase leading upward.

ladder_bottom.name: Ladder Bottom
ladder_bottom.description:
This is a rather wide room. On one side is the bottom of a
narrow wooden ladder. To the west and the south are passages
leaving the room.

dead_end_5.name: Vicolo Cieco
dead_end_5.description: Sei arrivato a un vicolo cieco nella miniera.

timber_room.name: Stanza delle Travi
timber_room.description:
This is a long and narrow passage, which is cluttered with broken
timbers. A wide passage comes from the east and turns at the
west end of the room into a very narrow passageway. From the west
comes a strong draft.

lower_shaft.name: Drafty Room
lower_shaft.description:
This is a small drafty room in which is the bottom of a long
shaft. To the south is a passageway and to the east a very narrow
passage. In the shaft can be seen a heavy iron chain.

mine_1.name: Coal Miniera
mine_1.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_2.name: Coal Miniera
mine_2.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_3.name: Coal Miniera
mine_3.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

mine_4.name: Coal Miniera
mine_4.description: This is a nondescript part of a coal mine.

inside_barrow.name: Inside the Tumulo
inside_barrow.description: Sei inside an ancient Tumulo hidden deep within a dark forestaa. The Tumulo opens into a narrow Tunnel at its Sudern end. You can see a faint glow at the far end.

narrow_tunnel.name: Narrow Tunnel
narrow_tunnel.description: Ti trovi at the Sudern end of a narrow Tunnel where it opens into a wide Grottarn. The Grottarn is dimly illuminated by phosphorescent mosses clinging to its high ceiling. A deep ravine winds through the Grottarn, with a small stream at the bottom. The walls of the ravine are steep and crumbly. A foot bridge crosses the ravine to the Sud.

foot_bridge.name: Foot Bridge
foot_bridge.description: Ti trovi on a crude but sturdy wooden foot bridge crossing a deep ravine. The Sentiero runs Nord and Sud from here.

great_cavern.name: Great Grottarn
great_cavern.description: This is the center of the great Grottarn, carved out of the limestone. Stalactites and stalagmites of many sizes are everywhere. The Stanza glows with dim light provided by phosphorescent moss, and weird shadows move tutt'intorno you. A narrow Sentiero winds SudOvest among the stalagmites, and another leads NordEst.

shallow_ford.name: SSalaow Ford
shallow_ford.description: You are at the Sudern edge of a great Grottarn. To the Sud across a sSalaow ford is a dark Tunnel which looks like it was once enlarged and smoothed. To the Nord a narrow Sentiero winds among stalagmites. Dim light illuminates the Grottarn.

dark_tunnel.name: Dark Tunnel
dark_tunnel.description: This is a dark Tunnel with dim light to the NordEst. The Tunnel is smooth but dusty and filled with twigs and leaves, debris which becomes deeper as the Tunnel branches into a wide corridor leading SudOvest and a narrower one leading SudEst.

garden_north.name: Nord End of Garden
garden_north.description: This is the Nordern end of a formal garden. Hedges hide the Grottarn walls, and if you don't look Su, the illusion is of a cloudy day outside. The light comes from a large growth of glowing mosses on the roof of the Grotta. A break in the hedge is almost overgrown to the Nord. A carefully manicured sentiero porta Sud. In the center of a rosebed is a small open structure, painted white. It appears to be a gazebo.

gazebo_room.name: Gazebo
gazebo_room.description: This is a gazebo in the midst of a formal garden. It is cool and restful here. A tea table adorns the center of the gazebo.

formal_garden.name: Formal Garden
formal_garden.description: This is the middle part of a formal garden. Hedges hide the Grottarn walls and a dim illumination comes from mosses far above. The Sentiero is of small crushed white stones. It winds among bushes and flower beds from Sud to Nord. To the Nord a small structure can be seen. To the Sud are peculiarly shaped bushes. C'è un small gap in the hedges to the Ovest.

topiary_room.name: Topiary
topiary_room.description: This is the Sudern end of a formal garden. Hedges hide the Grottarn walls and mosses provide dim illumination. Fantastically shaped hedges and bushes are arrayed with geometric precision. They have not recently been clipped, but you can discern creatures in the shapes of the bushes: C'è un dragon, a unicorn, a great serpent, a huge misshapen dog, and several human figures. On the Ovest side of the garden the sentiero porta through a rose arbor into a Tunnel.

stream_path.name: Sentiero Near Stream
stream_path.description: The Sentiero follows the Sud edge of a deep ravine and heads NordEst. A Tunnel heads SudOvest, narrowing to a rather tight crawl. A faint whirring sound can be heard in that direction. On the Est is a ruined archway choked with vegetation.

marble_hall.name: Marble Sala
marble_hall.description: This is an arched Sala of fine marble. The Sala stops abrSutly to the Nord at a ford across a stream, where the marble is cracked and broken. Perhaps a flood or collapse of the Grotta was responsible. To the Sud the Sala opens into a large Stanza. There is rather annoying whirring sound coming from that Stanza.

deep_ford.name: Deep Ford
deep_ford.description: You are fording the stream at a deep but not impossible spot. The acqua is very cold. The walls of the ravine rise to Est and Ovest. C'è un small ledge along the Nord wall of the ravine. To the Sud is the entrance to a well-constructed but somewhat ruined Sala.

ravine_ledge.name: Ledge in Ravine
ravine_ledge.description: You are on a narrow ledge near the bottom of a deep ravine. The ledge continues to the Ovest. A precarious climb Su to another tiny ledge is possible. A short scramble Giù the rock face leads to a stream.

ledge_tunnel.name: End of Ledge
ledge_tunnel.description: A ledge from the Est ends here, and a Tunnel leads Nord into the wall. C'è un rather odd smokey odor in the warm air of the Tunnel.

dragon_room.name: Dragon Stanza
dragon_room.description: The Stanza is a large Grottarn full of broken stone. The walls are scorched and there are deep scratches on the floor. A sooty dry smell is very strong here. A paved Sentiero winds from a large Passaggio to the Ovest, through the Stanza, and across a huge stone bridge to the Sud. To the Est a small crack is visible. A dark and smokey Tunnel leads Nord.

dragon_lair.name: Dragon's Lair
dragon_lair.description: Sei in the dragon's lair, where the rock walls are scarred by flame. A blackened doorway leads to the Sud.

fresco_room.name: Fresco Stanza
fresco_room.description: A sentiero porta Est-Ovest through a Stanza decorated with beautiful frescoes of someone battling dragons and rescuing fair maidens. It is hard to tell who is doing this as those parts of the frescoes have been blackened and cracked by intense heat.

stone_bridge.name: Stone Bridge
stone_bridge.description: This is the middle of a ruined but still impressive stone bridge spanning a deep chasm. acqua flows far beneath. A paved sentiero porta Nord into a large open space. To the Sud, the sentiero porta into a misty Tunnel.

cool_room.name: Cool Stanza
cool_room.description: The Stanza is cool and Digap. The air is misty. A twisty Sentiero from the SudEst splits here toward a wide Norderly stone bridge, and a narrow Ovesterly Tunnel. It is from the latter that the mist and chill seem to originate.

lava_tube.name: Lava Tube
lava_tube.description: Sei in a tight chimney of solidified lava. It extends Su at lEst another hundred feet and Giù to a large Stanza far below. A large crack opens to the Sud, probably the result of a shift in the rock strata.

cobwebby_corridor.name: Cobwebby Corridor
cobwebby_corridor.description: A winding corridor is filled with cobwebs. Some are broken and the dust on the floor is disturbed. The trend of the twists and turns is NordEst to SudOvest. On the Nord side of one twist, high Su, is a narrow crack.

kennel.name: Kennel
kennel.description: This Stanza looks like it was once a kennel for a very large dog (some of the bones would fit a dinosaur). It apparently hasn't been used for a long time, as the dust is fairly thick all over. The only exit is NordEst.

stairway_top.name: Stairway
stairway_top.description: A marble stairway leads Giù into the gloom and a Passaggio leads Nord.

diamond_1.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_1.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_2.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_2.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_3.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_3.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_4.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_4.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_5.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_5.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_6.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_6.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_7.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_7.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_8.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_8.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

diamond_9.name: Oddly-angled Stanza
diamond_9.description: A small Stanza with oddly angled walls and Passaggios in tutte le direzioni.

cerberus_room.name: Cerberus Stanza
cerberus_room.description: This is the entrance to a huge crypt or tomb. A marble stairway leads Su from a gateway arch.

wizards_workshop.name: Wizard's Workshop
wizards_workshop.description: This is the workshop of the Wizard of Frobozz.

workbench_room.name: Wizard's WorkStanza
workbench_room.description: This Stanza is the Wizard's workStanza. A Sala continues Est and Ovest, and a larger Stanza lies to the Sud. There are many shelves and racks on the walls, but the Wizard's workbench dominates the Stanza. It is made of dark, heavy wood bound with iron. The workbench is stained from many years of use, and is deeply gouged as though some huge clawed animal was imprisoned on it. There are burn marks and even notes written in a crabbed hand. Many arcane items are scattered about the bench; alembics, mortar and pestle, small knives of various sizes, odd scraps of vellum, wax candles, and much more. In the center of a relatively clear area of the bench are affixed three stands - rubino, sapphire, and diamante - which form a triangle.

trophy_room.name: Trophy Stanza
trophy_room.description: This is the Wizard's trophy Stanza, filled with memorabilia of various sorts. On one wall is the Wizard's D. T. (Doctor of Thaumaturgy) degree from GUE Tech. Several old magic wands are mounted on a wand rack. A collection of dull and nicked spadas testify to the fate of many foolhardy adventurers. Small bottiglias contain discarded homunculi (a few preserved in alcohol). C'è un stuffed owl on a perch.

pentagram_room.name: Pentagram Stanza
pentagram_room.description: In this Stanza, inscribed on the floor, is a great pentagram drawn with black chalk. In its center is a black circle.

aquarium_room.name: Aquarium Stanza
aquarium_room.description: Here a dark Salaway turns a corner. To the Sud is a dark Stanza, to the Est is fitful light.

in_aquarium.name: Murky Stanza
in_aquarium.description: The floor here seems to be made of sand, but it is hard to see anything else.

pearl_room.name: Pearl Stanza
pearl_room.description: This is a former bStanza closet. The exits are to the Est and Ovest.

volcano_bottom.name: Volcano Bottom
volcano_bottom.description: You are at the bottom of a large dormant volcano. High above you light enters from the cone of the volcano. The only exit is to the Nord.

vair_1.name: Volcano Core
vair_1.description: You are about one hundred feet above the bottom of the volcano. The top of the volcano is clearly visible here.

vair_2.name: Volcano Near Small Ledge
vair_2.description: You are about two hundred feet above the volcano floor. Looming above is the rim of the volcano. C'è un small ledge on the Ovest side.

vair_3.name: Volcano by Viewing Ledge
vair_3.description: You are high above the floor of the volcano. The rim of the volcano looks very narrow and you are very near it. To the Est is what appears to be a viewing ledge, too thin to land on.

vair_4.name: Volcano Near Wide Ledge
vair_4.description: You are near the rim of the volcano. Above you it is open to the sky. To the Ovest, C'è un place to land on a wide ledge.

ledge_1.name: Narrow Ledge
ledge_1.description: You are on a narrow ledge within an old dormant volcano. This ledge is about halfway between the floor below and the rim above. C'è unn exit to the Sud.

library.name: Library
library.description: This must have been a large library, probably for the royal family. All of the shelves have been gnawed to pieces by unfriendly gnomes. To the Nord is an exit.

volcano_view.name: Volcano View
volcano_view.description: You are on a ledge in the middle of a large volcano. Below you the volcano bottom can be seen and above is the rim of the volcano. A coSule of ledges can be seen on the other side of the volcano; it appears that this ledge is intermediate in elevation between those on the other side. The exit from this Stanza is to the Est.

lava_room.name: Lava Stanza
lava_room.description: This is a small Stanza, whose walls are formed by an old lava flow. There are exits here to the Est and the Sud.

cage_room.name: Dingy Closet
cage_room.description: This is a dingy closet adjacent to a larger Stanza to the Nord. Chiselled into a wall are these words:| |      Protected by|        FROBOZZ|  Magic Alarm Company|   (Hello, footpad!)|| There doesn't seem to be any footpad here, however.

in_cage.name: Cage
in_cage.description: You are trapped inside a solid steel cage.

well_top.name: Top of Well
well_top.description: You are at the top of the well. Well done. There are etchings on the side of the well. C'è un small crack across the floor at the entrance to a Stanza on the Est, but it can be crossed easily.

well_bottom.name: Circular Stanza
well_bottom.description: This is a Digap circular Stanza, whose walls are made of brick and mortar. The roof of this Stanza is not visible, but there appear to be some etchings on the walls. C'è un Passaggioway to the Ovest.

tea_room.name: Tea Stanza
tea_room.description: This is a small Stanza containing a large oblong table, no doubt set for afternoon tea. It is clear from the objects on the table that the users were indeed mad. In the Estern corner of the Stanza is a small hole (no more than four inches high). There are Passaggioways leading away to the Ovest and the NordOvest.

posts_room.name: Posts Stanza
posts_room.description: This is an enormous Stanza, in the center of which are four wooden posts delineating a rectangular area, above which is what appears to be a wooden roof. In fact, all objects in this Stanza appear to be abnormally large. To the Est is a Passaggioway. There are large gaping chasms to the Ovest and NordOvest.

pool_room.name: Pool Stanza
pool_room.description: This is a large Stanza, one half of which is depressed. Salty acqua flows from a large leak in the ceiling. The only exit is to the Ovest.

small_room.name: Small Stanza
small_room.description: This is a small, bare Stanza with no distinguishing features. There are no exits from this Stanza.

vault.name: Vault
vault.description: This is the Vault of the Bank of Zork, in which there are no doors.

office.name: Chairman's Office
office.description: This Stanza was the office of the Chairman of the Bank of Zork. Like the other Stanzas here, it has been extensively vandalized. The lone exit is to the Nord.

mr_ante.name: Button Stanza
mr_ante.description: You are at the Sudern end of a long Sala. To the Sud, stairs ascend into darkness. To the Nord the corridor is illuminated by torciaes set high in the walls, out of reach. On one wall is a red button.

dead_end.name: Dead End
dead_end.description: You have come to the end of two adjoining Passaggios to the Ovest and the NordOvest.

damp_passage.name: Digap Passaggio
damp_passage.description: This is a particularly Digap spot even by dungeon standards. You can see the junction to the Ovest, and two similar Passaggios to the Est and NordEst. A wide stone channel steeply descends into the Stanza from the Sud. It is covered with slippery moss and lichen. The channel crosses the Stanza, but the opening where it once continued Nord is now blocked by rubble.

east_corridor.name: Est Corridor
east_corridor.description: This is a Sala with polished marble walls. It widens slightly as it turns Ovest at its Nordern and Sudern ends.

west_corridor.name: Ovest Corridor
west_corridor.description: This is a Sala with polished marble walls. It widens slightly as it turns Est at its Nordern and Sudern ends.

prison_cell.name: Prison Cell
prison_cell.description: Sei in a bare prison cell. Its wooden door is securely fastened, and you can see only flames and smoke through its small finestra.

nirvana.name: Treasury of Zork
nirvana.description: This is a large Stanza, richly appointed in a style that bespeaks exquisite taste. To judge from its contents, it is the ultimate storeCasa of the wealth of the Great Underground Empire.| | There are chests containing precious gioielli, mountains of zorkmids, rare dipintos, ancient statuary, and beguiling curios.| | On one wall is an annotated map of the Empire, showing the locations of various troves of treasure, and of many sSuerior scenic views.| | On a desk at the far end of the Stanza are stock certificates representing a controlling interest in FrobozzCo International, the multinational conglomerate and parent company of the Frobozz Magic Boat Co., etc.|

mailbox.name: cassetta postale
mailbox.description: C'è una piccola cassetta postale qui.

leaflet.name: volantino
leaflet.read:
"BENVENUTO IN ZORK!

ZORK è un gioco di avventura, pericolo e astuzia. Esplorerai alcuni dei territori più incredibili mai visti dai mortali. Nessun computer dovrebbe farne a meno!"

lamp.name: lanterna di ottone
lamp.description: C'è una lanterna di ottone qui.
lamp.on_desc: La lanterna di ottone è accesa.

knife.name: coltello
knife.description: Su un tavolo c'è un coltello dall'aspetto minaccioso.

window.name: piccola finestra
window.description: Una piccola finestra è leggermente aperta.

trophy_case.name: vetrina trofei
trophy_case.description: Una grande vetrina trofei è contro la parete.

rug.name: tappeto orientale
rug.description: Un grande tappeto orientale è al centro della stanza.

teeth.name: insieme di denti
teeth.description: C'è un insieme di denti qui.

granite_wall.name: muro di granito
granite_wall.description: C'è un muro di granito qui.

kitchen_window.name: finestra della cucina
kitchen_window.description: C'è una finestra della cucina qui.

skull.name: teschio di cristallo
skull.description: C'è un teschio di cristallo qui.

bell.name: campana di ottone
bell.description: C'è una campana di ottone qui.

hot_bell.name: campana di ottone rovente
hot_bell.description: C'è una campana di ottone rovente qui.

kitchen_table.name: tavolo della cucina
kitchen_table.description: C'è un tavolo della cucina qui.

tool_chest.name: gruppo di cassette di attrezzi
tool_chest.description: C'è un gruppo di cassette di attrezzi qui.

trident.name: tridente di cristallo
trident.description: C'è un tridente di cristallo qui.

barrow_door.name: porta di pietra
barrow_door.description: C'è una porta di pietra qui.

barrow.name: tumulo di pietra
barrow.description: C'è un tumulo di pietra qui.

bottle.name: bottiglia di vetro
bottle.description: C'è una bottiglia di vetro qui.

pump.name: pompa d'aria portatile
pump.description: C'è una pompa d'aria portatile qui.

jade.name: figurina di giada
jade.description: C'è una figurina di giada qui.

bag_of_coins.name: borsa di pelle con monete
bag_of_coins.description: C'è una borsa di pelle con monete qui.

advertisement.name: volantino
advertisement.read:
"BENVENUTO IN ZORK!

ZORK è un gioco di avventura, pericolo e astuzia. Esplorerai alcuni dei territori più incredibili mai visti dai mortali. Nessun computer dovrebbe farne a meno!"

match.name: libretto di fiammiferi
match.description: C'è un libretto di fiammiferi qui.

candles.name: paio di candele
candles.description: C'è un paio di candele qui.

gunk.name: piccolo pezzo di scoria vetrosa
gunk.description: C'è un piccolo pezzo di scoria vetrosa qui.

bodies.name: mucchio di corpi
bodies.description: C'è un mucchio di corpi qui.

leaves.name: mucchio di foglie
leaves.description: C'è un mucchio di foglie qui.

inflatable_boat.name: mucchio di plastica
inflatable_boat.description: C'è un mucchio di plastica qui.

bar.name: barra di platino
bar.description: C'è una barra di platino qui.

railing.name: ringhiera di legno
railing.description: C'è una ringhiera di legno qui.

bracelet.name: bracciale incrostato di zaffiri
bracelet.description: C'è un bracciale incrostato di zaffiri qui.

coal.name: piccolo mucchio di carbone
coal.description: C'è un piccolo mucchio di carbone qui.

ladder.name: scala di legno
ladder.description: C'è una scala di legno qui.

scarab.name: bellissimo scarabeo ingioiellato
scarab.description: C'è un bellissimo scarabeo ingioiellato qui.

wooden_door.name: porta di legno
wooden_door.description: C'è una porta di legno qui.

trunk.name: baule di gioielli
trunk.description: C'è un baule di gioielli qui.

engravings.name: muro con incisioni
engravings.description: C'è un muro con incisioni qui.

control_panel.name: pannello di controllo
control_panel.description: C'è un pannello di controllo qui.

egg.name: uovo incastonato di gioielli
egg.description: C'è un uovo incastonato di gioielli qui.

broken_egg.name: uovo incastonato di gioielli rotto
broken_egg.description: C'è un uovo incastonato di gioielli rotto qui.

bauble.name: bellissimo ninnolo di ottone
bauble.description: C'è un bellissimo ninnolo di ottone qui.

canary.name: canarino a carica dorato
canary.description: C'è un canarino a carica dorato qui.

broken_canary.name: canarino a carica rotto
broken_canary.description: C'è un canarino a carica rotto qui.

unicorn.name: unicorn
unicorn.description: C'è un beautiful unicorn here cropping grass.

chest.name: rotten wooden chest
chest.initial_desc: A rotten old wooden chest is in one corner among the debris.

statuette.name: oroen dragon statuette
statuette.initial_desc: Nestled in the chest is a wrought oro statuette of a dragon.

dragon.name: huge red dragon
dragon.description: A huge red dragon is lying on the rocks here, watching.
dragon.initial_desc: A huge red dragon is lying here, blocking the entrance to a Tunnel che porta a nord. Smoke curls from his nostrils and out between his teeth.

dead_dragon.name: huge dead dragon
dead_dragon.description: A huge dead dragon is lying half blocking the stream.

princess.name: beautiful princess
princess.description: A beautiful young woman, wearing a dirty and bedraggled gown, sits on a rock in the corner. Her hair is unkempt and she is oblivious to your presence, almost in a trance.

collar.name: gigantic dog collar
collar.initial_desc: A gigantic dog collar, large enough for three rhinoceros-sized dogs, is lying amidst the debris.

cerberus.name: three-headed dog
cerberus.description: C'è un vicious-looking dog guarding the entrance. It is more or less your usual dog, except that it has three heads and is the size of an elephant.

palantir_4.name: black crystal sphere
palantir_4.description: C'è un strange black sphere here.

warning_label.name: warning label
warning_label.description: A hand-lettered label is affixed to the wall.

wizard_case.name: Wizard's trophy cabinet
wizard_case.description: Imbedded in the wall is an ornate trophy cabinet.

broken_case.name: smashed trophy cabinet
broken_case.description: Shards of a smashed vetrina trofei litter the Stanza.

aquarium.name: aquarium
aquarium.description: Filling the Nordern half of the Stanza is a huge aquarium.

palantir_3.name: clear crystal sphere
palantir_3.description: C'è un clear crystal sphere lying in the sand.

serpent.name: baby sea serpent
serpent.description: C'è un baby sea serpent swimming in the aquarium.

dead_serpent.name: dead sea serpent
dead_serpent.description: C'è un dead sea serpent in a heap here.

gnome.name: Volcano Gnome
gnome.description: C'è un nervous Volcano Gnome here.

brick.name: brick
brick.description: C'è un square brick here which feels like clay.

explosion.name: debris from an explosion
explosion.description: The Stanza is cluttered with debris from an explosion. The walls seem ready to collapse.

dead_balloon.name: broken balloon
dead_balloon.description: C'è un balloon here, broken into pieces.

card.name: card
card.description: C'è un card with writing on it here.

crown.name: gaudy crown
crown.initial_desc: The excessively gaudy crown of Lord Dimwit Flathead sits in the safe.

ice.name: glacier
ice.description: A mass of ice fills the Ovestern half of the Stanza.

flask.name: stoppered glass flask filled with liquid
flask.description: A stoppered glass flask with a teschio-and-crossbones marking is here. The flask is filled with some clear liquid.

robot_label.name: green piece of paper
robot_label.description: C'è un green piece of paper here.

hook_2.name: hook
hook_2.description: C'è un small hook attached to the rock here.

hook_1.name: hook
hook_1.description: C'è un small hook attached to the rock here.

mangled_cage.name: mangled cage
mangled_cage.description: C'è un mangled steel cage here.

pearl.name: pearl necklace
pearl.description: C'è un pearl necklace here with hundreds of large pearls.

pool.name: pool of tears
pool.description: The leak has submerged the depressed area in a pool of tears. C'è un hazy something at the deepest part of the pool.

coin.name: priceless zorkmid
coin.initial_desc: On the floor is a priceless oro zorkmid (a valuable collector's item).

green_book.name: green libro
green_book.initial_desc: A handsome libro, bound in green leather, sits in the center of the Stanza.

blue_book.name: blue libro
blue_book.initial_desc: Worn and battered in one corner of the Stanza is a blue libro.

white_book.name: white libro
white_book.initial_desc: Right beside the purple libro sits a white one.

purple_book.name: purple libro
purple_book.description: Lying in the dust, and covered with mold, is a purple libro.

ruby.name: rubino
ruby.description: C'è un moby rubino lying here.
ruby.initial_desc: On the floor lies a moby rubino.

iron_box.name: steel box
iron_box.description: C'è un dented steel box here.

cage.name: solid steel cage
cage.description: C'è un solid steel cage in the middle of the Stanza.

candy.name: package of candy
candy.description: C'è un package of candied goodies here.

fuse.name: black string
fuse.description: C'è un coil of black, braided string here.

bucket.name: wooden bucket
bucket.description: C'è un wooden bucket here, 3 feet in diameter and 3 feet high.

bills.name: stack of zorkmid bills
bills.description: 200 neatly stacked zorkmid bills are here.
bills.initial_desc: On the floor sit 200 neatly stacked zorkmid bills.

portrait.name: portrait of J. Pierpont Flathead
portrait.description: The portrait of J. Pierpont Flathead is here.
portrait.initial_desc: A portrait of J. Pierpont Flathead hangs on the wall.

bank_brochure.name: bank brochure
bank_brochure.initial_desc: On the ground is a small, worn piece of paper.

gnome_of_zurich.name: Gnome of Zurich
gnome_of_zurich.description: C'è un Gnome of Zurich here.

palantir_2.name: blue crystal sphere
palantir_2.initial_desc: In the center of the table sits a blue crystal sphere.

genie.name: demon
genie.description: C'è un demon floating in midair here.

wizard.name: Wizard of Frobozz
wizard.description: The Wizard of Frobozz is here, eyeing you warily.

warning_note.name: warning note
warning_note.initial_desc: Lying on the ground is a small note of some kind.

lore_book.name: very ancient libro
lore_book.initial_desc: Nestled inside the niche is an old and dusty libro.

dungeon_master.name: dungeon master
dungeon_master.description: The dungeon master is quietly leaning on his staff here.

troll.name: troll
troll.description: Un troll dall'aspetto sgradevole blocca il passaggio.
troll.dead_desc: Il corpo morto di un troll giace qui.
troll.attacks: Il troll agita la sua ascia verso di te!

thief.name: ladro
thief.description: Un individuo losco si nasconde nelle ombre.
